website_summaries.verdict: A popular choice for a first Fossil watch. Hits all the highlights, from oversized face to chronograph functionality. Straddles the line between casual and dress. Bold, masculine design.
cons: Battery may need to be replaced upon arrival
Hour hand is difficult to read

customer_reviews.title: great watch and gave it away as a gift after ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a man watch. Its all black, no lights, no other colors. Makes sure that's what you really looking for before you buy. I owned a fossil similar to this one not all black out, great watch and gave it away as a gift after I had it for over 5yrs. Fossil makes great men watches.
customer_reviews.author: **Padrones**

customer_reviews.title: She got me back on the fossil wagon...
customer_reviews.text: Been with fossil for 14 years. First one i bought for 35 bucks at a Macy's and I was hooked. 16 watches later I felt like they have been slacking but this... This watch is Campbell's good. Mmm mmm! Solid, heavy, very alpha, and the colors! They fit like fries and ketchup. I have 2 other Nate style watches and this one is the best. Have yet to take her for a spin. But she looking nice. Real nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kadmiel Fenton, II

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is great. I was a little confused with the packaging. For starters, it was thrown in an envelope and when I got it, the tin it came in was a little dented and the cover was off and watch out. It works fine, but for the money not impressed. It is also a men’s watch and comes in a tin box that says yes girl yes. Huh?? This is a father’s day present. Not a sweet 16 for a teenage girl. He’ll laugh when he opens it but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Mans man time piece
customer_reviews.text: This is one sexy and masculine watch. I haven't messed with the dials yet but it feels pretty well made. Dial has a nice click and feel to it. Band feels cheap but looks good. Nice lume. Very easy to read. One negative is after 3 days of owning I woke up to it being 20 mins slow. Turned out battery was in the yellow. Fits my 7.5" wrist well with one link out. Nice watch for the money
customer_reviews.author: EStats13

customer_reviews.title: Big Face, Small Band
customer_reviews.text: If the band fit, it’d be a nice watch, but unfortunately it seems like it is designed for someone with a tiny wrist. Even at the largest option, the watch didn’t fit over just the finger knuckles, much less over the thumb. I am 6’2” with a 7-8” wrist, and tried a friend’s Fossil with the leather band, which fit. It is unfortunate because the watch is a good looking timepiece. The contract of numbers against the face make it easy to read - a nice military appearance. I could see no more than three stars as a watch with such a large case should have been designed with a band to fit a normal wrist
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: very nice I really love this watch and I am using everyday, nothing to complain
customer_reviews.author: Victor Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking watch for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I love the all black look to the watch. Very nice and clean matte finish to it. A bit on the bulky side with the large face but it looks great! Got quite a few compliments towards it at work. The only complaint that I will say, which really isn't a complaint, but was a tad difficult to resize the band. As in popping the little rods out of the brackets to remove a couple. (Does not effect the rating)
customer_reviews.author: Blake Randall

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present for my husband and he loves it. He is a little bit of a big guy (6 ft+) and his only issue is that we wish there was an extra link or two because it's a little tight and hard to get on for him. The man is built like Dwayne Johnson and so wristwatches are hard for him to buy and wear. We will be looking for a decent link to extend this watch. Otherwise it's a great time piece and we highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: New watch every year. In the past 20 years this is in my top 5. Big face yet thin. Sharp designs with easy to read numbers. Band is a little thin but it's sturdy and the clasp is well designed. In the photo for reference im 6 ft2 255 pounds
customer_reviews.author: stephen smith

customer_reviews.title: So, the face is actually so large that it ...
customer_reviews.text: So, the face is actually so large that it pushes into the back of my hand if I bend my hand backwards at all. I figured I might get used to it, but I really only wear the thing on occasions where I want to be slightly more dressed up than usual. So on the one hand, I don't get used to it, but on the other hand, I only deal with it on occasion. Still 3 stars because I really dig the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived, earlier than expected. Beautiful watch was even set to the right time out of the box. May need to remove a link for a more snug fit. But love the large size really easy to read. Plan on ordering another one in a different color just to have.First Fosil to have ever owned, Hope it lives up to the hype and reputation of the Fosil name and standard.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Men’s watch repackaged in little girl packaging!!??
customer_reviews.text: MENS watch arrived packages in a box designed for GIRLS complete with an actual picture of a woman and flowers AND the words “YES GIRL YES”??!!! SOOO TACKY AND CHEAP of the seller to have the audacity to send out a product like that. Definitely NOT suitable for gifting now. Will not be purchasing ever again.
customer_reviews.author: JJsmom

customer_reviews.title: They have to pay more attention to the details
customer_reviews.text: The case that contains the watch has a girly desing, not really apporpiate for a mens watch. The user manual is printed in ultra small fine print, and it is very hard to follow. The strap is too big for me. There are no instructions or tools to remove the links. The buttons on the watch feel cheap, and the watch is almost too heave. I am really considering returning the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: awesome...for a guy
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this watch, but it's not because it's not awesome! I am female, but like bigger watches so I bought a man's watch. This was just too big for me though. I wanted to keep it because it is awesome looking, but in the end I realized that I was being silly. It looked awkward and was very obviously too clunky for my wrist. It is so fierce though. And it would look fantastic on a bigger wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something with subdued colors as I normally wear darker clothing, as well as something that stresses function over fashion while still looking nice. This totally hit the nail on the head. I was worried the face would be far too large and look silly, but I was wrong. I think it looks great on me and my frame (6' 215lbs, for reference). While it is difficult to read in low light situations, this has not been a big con for me as I normally carry a small streamlight torch as well. I've received several compliments on this watch and would highly recommend it to anybody that finds it appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Not a big deal
customer_reviews.text: The finished look fades after a few weeks revealing it's true look. I'm a neat freak and all my things have to be clean and well kept. Trust me this watch will not look as good after a while of using it. For a fossil watch i expected better. I should have gotten the armani exchange watch instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rell F.

customer_reviews.title: A big watch that fits a big wrist.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is big but so is my wrist. The metal band fits while the cloth and leather bands did not. I am marking it down because it came bubble wrapped in a box with other orders in it and had no instructions on how to use the various buttons and settings on the watch. It is a pain to have to go online and spend 30 to 40 minutes hunting around on the Fossil website for directions to this particular watch. Irritating but not a deal breaker. I have now had the watch for 2 years - the band started falling apart after a year and today it died. Should not happen with a stainless steel band
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent looking watch but had to return because of how much condensation developed on the face from only two weeks of showering. I was extremely disappointed and just had the amount refunded into my account. You would think a watch from a reputable company like Fossil would hold up better for what they charge.
customer_reviews.author: jim chiarodo

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, but subtle
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on this watch for a while. It has a large fade but is lightweight, stylish, but not over the top, a great everyday watch. Fossil watches have always been the most durable from my previous experience with them, looking forward to having this watch for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Mitch L

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Simply the Best.....
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know how I would like an all black watch since none of my 48 watches are all black but I decided to get my first one with this fossil since fossil is my favorite brand of watch and I have to say I am very impressed still easy to read while looking sharp great job fossil.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hammitt

customer_reviews.title: Strap too short with large watch face
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch but a bit too large for me to be functional. The strap is unusually short for such a large watch. I barely got it to fit on the last hole. I could have replaced the straps for additional $ but decided the face of the watch was too large for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyLikesIt

customer_reviews.title: Just an amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch was the second I bought from amazon and I was blown away by the craftsmanship, the style, and how freaking cool it looks. Whether you are dress casual, sporty, or whatever, this watch just fits in perfectly. Even though it is a big watch, it is very subtle and Fossil is just one of the best watch makers out there. I have recommended this watch to many family members and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding watch. Great style and feel from the leather band. I feel persons zooming on my wrist and I can tell they are impressed. I thought at first that the hands could do with some reflective material for viewing in the dark but it's really not so bad. I'm very satisfied with this my first Fossil. I'm already eyeing another for my birthday in 2019
customer_reviews.author: JAGS

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I loved this watch. The look and quality was very nice, just as expected from fossil. I bought this for my boyfriend as a surprise but did not give it to him just due to the size. The face and band width were rather large. I knew he wouldn’t like it just due to other watches and their sizes that he owns. I ended up returning it simply due to size. If you or whoever you’re buying this for likes larger watches, this would be perfect. I suggest you reference the numbers on this and a comparable watch you have on hand for size reference!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch, but didn't survive pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking watch with a good weight to it, but had some problems. The watch is listed as suitable for swimming, but after being in a pool for about an hour, moisture entered, and the watch had condensation in it for several months. When the fog finally cleared, the watch battery died ( lasted about 2 or 3 years ) Also the watch is quite big and the buttons protrude from it quite a bit, making it sometimes uncomfortable against the forearm.
customer_reviews.author: GI

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality, great size and weight
customer_reviews.text: The size and weight are great, absolutely love this watch. Minute and hour hand glow. I work in the garage and outdoors a lot I always ruin stuff like this and so far it has held up exceptionally well, I dragged it on a rusty truck door accidentally and was afraid to even look, it made a huge scratch down the door and I just brushed the paint chips off the watch with my shirt, didn’t even mark it. 11/10 from me ✌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Luke Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Display off
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but display is off by almost 1/2 second and doesn't align with any seconds. I've had watches for 15-30 bucks that were more accurate, usually a sign for cheapo. Definitely no precision there. Solid wristband. Didn't fog up yet, hence 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Z

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for my boyfriend And I think he'll love It. A great watch (in te pictures, I'm using the watch so my wrist is smaller than a man's)
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Maria Camayo

customer_reviews.title: I bought two watches and even though I like the simple look of the other one (can see ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two watches and even though I like the simple look of the other one (can see both in attached video) this one seems to be a better build quality and where little things like the seconds arm not covering each stripe precisely (will see in video) bothers me a lot with the other one. This one does not have any of those problems. In my opinion it is a great buy whilst it is still on special.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. I was looking at more expensive watches, and own a large Luminox Atacama field watch. I was going to buy another one of those (in the $500-$600) range when I had a thought to buy a much less expensive Fossil. This is the one I chose, and I'm not sorry...got a watch that looks just as nice for one-quarter the price. For those who don't have tons of money to be spending on expensive watches, this is the way to go. It has a nice, think, substantial leather band, too...just as nice as the Luminox's.
customer_reviews.author: JSBachRules

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift for boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch, registered it on Fossil’s website and then took it to a store in the mall to get it engraved as a present for the man in my life. He loves it and wears it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marchi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it the face is a little bigger than I expected hit it actually looks really masculine and good on my boyfriend. I got this for him for Christmas and he loves it - perfect for casual wear
customer_reviews.author: stephanie danae meaglia

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. 1 of my favs ever owned by Fossil..
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Band was NOT real leather Battery was dead. Emailed Amazon and they directed me to either send back or take to Fossil for replacement battery. Paid Fossil to replace and watch still didn't work. Don't buy this junk
customer_reviews.author: K.Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought a different style of this same watch but it was too formal for my husband he requested a different style so I bought both and he loves this one for every day use. The size took him a min to get used to but loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Read the Time
customer_reviews.text: The watch runs fine but is nearly impossible to read unless I’m very bright light. The hands are dark gray against a background of charcoal. Returning the watch.
customer_reviews.author: MustangMary

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousin as a gift for getting accepted into college! He loves the look and comfort of the band! Buying Fossil watches is a no brainer! Great company producing great bang for your buck items! 10 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: ShkMD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! My husband is in love with this watch. Big face, easy to read, and def water resistant (worn all day @ water park with no issues). Perfect Father’s Day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof and it damage three times
customer_reviews.text: No waterproof!!!! I went to fossil, and they “fixed it” twice... but still with the same defect. And they don’t change me the watch because I bought it online by amazon. I’m really upset, I don’t know what to do to get another one. Please let me know the steps to follow.
customer_reviews.author: HValeria

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it's my second time buying it. (I unfortunately damaged it the first time by dropping it but it was not the watch's fault. It's stylish and great value for the money, even at full price. I always get compliments when wearing it too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I got it for my bf for valentine's day and he loves it. Easy to use and aesthetically pleasing. It has regular clock, a minute clock up to 30 minutes along with a 60 sec clock, a small 24 hr clock, and the date.
customer_reviews.author: Billy G.

customer_reviews.title: Wearing versatility
customer_reviews.text: Looks no cheap at all. You can either wear it on casual clothes (long sleeve shirt and jeans) or khaki shorts and your Vans. The watch really complement your look! Its big. You need a good wrist size. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Fancy, but yet Classy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, I bought it as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and he loved it! It looks classic and it being all black gives it a sophisticated look.
customer_reviews.author: CV91

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Good overall watch. Came brand new! Sturdy but stiff band with nice large face. Was hard to get off due to stiff band, had to really yank on it. Watch is not good in the dark. No light and I’m not sure if the hands and numbers are glow in the dark or not. It would be great if they are. Not sure if it’s advertised as such. Overall thoughts.......very nice watch. Love the all back and it seems to be of good quality all around
customer_reviews.author: Ctoher

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comes in a great watch tin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch for my lover. It is very flashy looking and the best part is you have the opportunity to take your watch in and get your name embroidered on the back of the watch! For free! How cool is that!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Herring

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks good, but poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I liked the watch, but the packaging as I show in the photo is totally poor, the watch came loose in the bag. the open box, luckily it didn't break. I would add the accessory to remove links from the bracelet
customer_reviews.author: Kennyth Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great watch can be wore as both casual and formal
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, it has a big dial that suits people with wider wrists. The numbering and the dial glow in the dark and the stop watch works perfectly fine. The leather belt is of good quality and the dark color gives a rich look. Overall quality is very nice. I got it for a good deal at $90 with taxes.
customer_reviews.author: Vikas

customer_reviews.title: Wear it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Great quality watch. Heavy weight and very durable. The face has not scratched after a few months of normal wear and tear usage. Time remains highly accurate. I only wish the gray arms and numbers were a slightly greater contrast from the overall black background. I really like this watch!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chad Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not an authentic Fossil watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is not a real Fossil watch, it seems to be a copy within an original box with little details saying "Fossil" but not an authentic one... this should be clarified on the product details, unless I received a fake one by mistake. Additionally, it does not work well, the needle moves, but gets intermittently stuck... Not happy at all, considering price and descriptions.... Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch! Bought as I am done with my FitBit. All dials work. Two of them operate like a stop watch and third dial tracks the hour in military time. Date works fine. Really nice size dial. Would buy again. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: CalebBrian

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite watch.
customer_reviews.text: I have quite afew watches and like to switch them up. I first saw this watch at the Fossil store and loved the monochromatic look of it, the black with subdued grey marking are reminiscent of a stealth bomber. Happily I found it on Amazon for approx. 30% less and immediately purchased it. While it's not the easiest watch to read in dim light it's understated elegance and sense of purpose are impressive. The band is a bit small for my wrist but is well crafted and just fits. I highly recommend this watch to anyone interested in a black watch that exudes power and no-nonsense purpose.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barnard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Found out the product is pretty sturdy as it came unpackaged. During shipping the box became opened and the watch was just in the wrap and the top and bottom of the box were floating around. I would find a way to at least make sure the box does not open during shipping. Have not tested the water resistance yet (don't plan on trying). Timer function seems good, but have not used it as well. Easy to read the watch.
customer_reviews.author: DL - Shakopee, MN

customer_reviews.title: Great, stylist watch! Easy-to-Read to read
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this as a birthday gift for my partner. Beautiful watch, have to get a link removed so it'll fit properly other than that it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Best Value hands down
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father. The watch was perfectly boxed, and came with the fossil box in perfect condition. The watch looks amazing in person and fossil offers a free engraving on the watch! Which is a great plus for any gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nick nohnston

customer_reviews.title: I am a 6 foot tall male with normal wrists ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6 foot tall male with normal wrists. This watch extended past both sides of my wrist. It had small bubbles in the covering glass and no instructions for the two small dials embedded in the watch surface. Way too expensive and worthless
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Metz

customer_reviews.title: Great big face watch for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been to many fossil outlets and choose watches that are in the same price range. Problem is replacing the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Manly
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect Fathers day gift. The color, size and the link bracelet, you can use it on the daily basis or when all dressed up.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedez

customer_reviews.title: nice piece
customer_reviews.text: a little larger than I thought it was going to be over all nice watch if like a big watch this is the one for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scuff marks
customer_reviews.text: I had been waiting for the right time to buy this watch and finally caught it on sale just in time for Father’s Day. He loved the watch but I was so disappointed when it had marks on the band and on the side of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Watch but the pieces will hurt you :(
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking watch. I liked that it had a larger face but the 3 pieces on the side ended up cutting into my wrist within about 20 minutes. I read that other people said the same but I was hoping it would not bother me, but it did :(
customer_reviews.author: karebare1003

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Me and my boys got this for my husband for his birthday he loves it!!! He needed a new watch and this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my fiance. He loves it and it looks really good on. No functional issues, easy to set and use.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: A little different than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good watch. It needed fitting, which I did at the mall, but this was absolutely expected. Love the design. The watch head was bigger than I was expecting, but I got used to it after a while. Classy watch for fancy events. The metal wristband was thinner metal than I was expecting, but I also got over this. Fossil doesn't usually dissapoint, which is why I only took one star away from the review.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking- heavy watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a very large face and it is relatively heavy. I bought the fully black watch and it is easy to read. My husband had to take to a jewelry doctor and have 3 clasps taken out for it to fit his wrist. Overall this is a very elegant looking watch, just be aware that it is on the larger side. Also, you can take the watch to your local Fossil Watch store and get it engraved for free.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, color is different than depicted
customer_reviews.text: The color in the picture isn't accurate. The face is a dark chocolate brown, and the hands & numerals are a light tan. It looks amazing and I love it but the picture vs actual look threw me off.
customer_reviews.author: Whitefeather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was for a gift and he was really happy... Kind of big for those with thin wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Item came in a female watch box. ITEM WAS NOT NEW AS STATED. And it was “thrown” together in box.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brazil

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for a tropical country
customer_reviews.text: - Cristal easily scratched - Band is not stainless steel, in fact is the worst band I have had in my whole life.Twice the watch left my wrist because the links came off - Links get eroded. - Not suitable for a tropical country - Will never buy a Fossil watch again. The only good thing is that is beautiful and keeps the time
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Sequeira

customer_reviews.title: The watch is very nice, I gave it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice, I gave it as a gift. But unfortunately the tin that it came in was damaged (extremely dented and scratched). I was also a little confused by the fact that it was shipped in a purple and gold mermaid tin...considering this is clearly a mens watch...I wasn't able to gift it in that tin regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift over the holidays and they loved it. I might get one for myself as ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift over the holidays and they loved it. I might get one for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Rox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day, and he loves it. He says it's his favorite watch he has ever had. It looks and feels so expensive and well-made. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry waters

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and price
customer_reviews.text: Great gift able item. Loved how fast it came to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Anachristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift & stylish & classy
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift for my nephew. He’s 19yrs old and wore it that same day. The metallic black is classy.
customer_reviews.author: Marylynd

customer_reviews.title: I think the face of it is a little too dark when the lighting isn’t good which makes it harder to read and the face ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch! I think the face of it is a little too dark when the lighting isn’t good which makes it harder to read and the face of the watch is a little large on his wrist, but he doesn’t actually mind any of that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Van Lear

customer_reviews.title: Very nice feel
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he got it resized the day it came in and has been wearing it everyday since he loves it and it looks great on him!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sebren

customer_reviews.title: To each his own
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this item because my son didn't like it. I was much heavier and the face was much larger than he anticipated from what was posted online. Having said that, he's not too concerned about being "fashion-forward" or anything like that. This may be perfect for someone else...just not my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kline

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be true Fossil watch. Nice looking and packaged well. Will be a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: L. Verite

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to tell time with large watch face. The buttons on the side were a little confusing at first since it doesnt come with a manual (you have to go online and download it). The only dislike is that the hands dont glow in the dark for you to see in dim places. Other than that, looks great and pretty simple!
customer_reviews.author: XxCoDeMaNxX

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. So far so good. Really nice detail on the chrono pieces. Larger than usual face. The only drawback I'm seeing is the leather watchband is quite small. I'll probabaly buy a new band. Otherwise, seems, feels and looks high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Ceksim

customer_reviews.title: and I really like it. The construction is solid yet comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This watch is stylish, and I really like it. The construction is solid yet comfortable. But why put a cheap plastic cover on the face. It scratches too easily. Seems like a cheap final tough to an otherwise well constructed watch. If this was a 20 dollar watch I can see but for a Fossil, I would have expected better.
customer_reviews.author: AJNight

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I got the all black version and it looks fantastic. Hand to remove three links to make it fit. The face is pretty large but even on my thinner wrist it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Loving it buying another one soon
customer_reviews.text: Loving it, nice and big, decent weight to it(I like the heavier watches) and it's water proof enough for me lol havent done anything crazy like diving or anything but ive showered with it and I've gotten it wet plenty of times and havent seen any watter gwtting in it
customer_reviews.author: Jesus S.

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Was the first gift I got for my boyfriend. He wears it every day, even while working. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Scott

customer_reviews.title: To cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy. Band not adjustable. No instructions. Can't find model on line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big head but good buy
customer_reviews.text: For me the head of the watch was too big but I like it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Kinkade

customer_reviews.title: A good looking lightweight watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks great. The numbers are raised off of the face, giving it a unique look. The mechanisms are easy to use, and the diameter is accurate at 50mm. For those who prefer watches with some weight, keep in mind that this watch is a bit lightweight. The only complaint, albeit a small one, is that the band occasionally snags and tears out wrist hair.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Ouchhh
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought this was an April fool's joke...because o th size it is HUGE. So I played it off well and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. I bought it for my son and he really liked it. It is on the large side but good for 20 year olds. Only issue is it was running when it arrived. I found this to be odd as it should have not had the battery active until I pulled out the plastic guard. So I don't know how long the battery has been running before I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Too Big of Face
customer_reviews.text: We did not care for how huge the face was. It looked like he had Flava Flav's clock necklace on his wrist. We returned it and bought a different watch at a brick and mortar store. Return in the Amazon locker was easy.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the quality is top notch, wear it everyday for the past 3 months and it is holding up great and I have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Very sturdy and nice looking watch. My boyfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great thanks it came just on time! It’s a very good looking watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: boyfriend wears it constantly
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice watch. it has a good weight to it. The wrist band comes a little larger so you can size it how you need it. Got this as a birthday gift for me boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. He works in a warehouse and there isn't even a single scratch on it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loved it. Shipping was way to fast (witch was awesome) . will order again and surprise my man again. Good quality watch.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but the black finish started to wear off in ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but the black finish started to wear off in a month and now a pin just fell out of the band so it’s dead to me after 5 months
customer_reviews.author: jza

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this product. It is a bit on the heavy side but it shows that the quality is good. My boyfriend loved it, but he would have preferred a smaller face and it being lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Nnf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband for Christmas and he is VERY happy with it. He loves the black on black on black and loves how big the face is. It has a nice leather strap and is beautiful. He has gotten many compliments on it. All depending on the size of your wrist, this watch would be great for anyone who is a watch lover. I do suggest maybe you print a template of the size of the face to make sure it's not too big for your wrist. Everyone's different.
customer_reviews.author: Kgali

customer_reviews.title: Nice but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, quality, and good looking watch. The only thing I don't like is just how big and heavy it is. Again, the watch looks really nice and is sharp, but it's quite large and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: BoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not lit inside hard to read in dark but hubby likes it
customer_reviews.text: Large Face hard to read in the dark. Very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Magic

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his groom's gift. He absolutely adored it - has always been a big Fossil fan. The only qualm was it is a tad big so we need to get a link taken out but other than that, it has been a wonderful watch!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Barber

product_meta.title: Fossil Men's Nate Stainless Steel Chronograph Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
Made for weekend warriors, Nate’s eye-catching construction and on-the-move functionality play with a laidback yet rugged style. Add some military-inspired style to your wrist with our matte black stainless steel watch. A classic black and amber dial with white lum indexes adds instant polish to any look. This Nate watch also features a chronograph movement on a stainless steel bracelet.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  [PDF 6.19 MB] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.02 x 11.1 x 6.54 inches; 2.86 Ounces
 * Item model number :JR1487
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 10, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Fossil Watches
 * ASIN :B00NVAWTLY

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars4,659 ratings Made for weekend warriors, Nate’s eye-catching construction and on-the-move functionality play with a laidback yet rugged style. Add some military-inspired style to your wrist with our matte black stainless steel watch. A classic black and amber dial with white lum indexes adds instant polish to any look. This Nate watch also features a chronograph movement on a stainless steel bracelet.
feature_bullets: Case size: 50mm; Band size: 24mm; quartz movement with 3-hand analog display; mineral crystal face; imported
Black plated stainless steel case; black dial with date window and rose gold tone Arabic numerals
Genuine brown leather band with buckle closure; interchangeable with all Fossil 24mm watch straps
Multifunction watch with stopwatch functionality; three separate dials to track hours, minutes and seconds; timer; date window; 24 hour
Water resistant to 165 feet (50 M): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling; Strap Inner Circumference: 200+/- 5MM
